sourcesContent:
<template>
	<van-cell
		center
		:title="
			theme === 'dark' ? $t('settings.theme.dark') : $t('settings.theme.light')
		"
	>
		<template #right-icon>
			<van-switch v-model="theme === 'dark'" @change="changeTheme" />
		</template>
	</van-cell>
</template>

<script setup>
import appBridge from '@/mixins/app-bridge';
import { computed, ref } from 'vue';
import { onMounted } from 'vue';
import { useStore } from 'vuex';

const store = useStore();

const checked = ref(false);

const theme = computed(() => store.state.Auth.theme);

// onMounted(() => {
// 	if (theme === 'dark') {
// 		checked.value = true;
// 	}
// });

function changeTheme() {
	if (checked.value) {
		store.dispatch('Auth/putTheme', 'dark');
		// appBridge.methods.nativeSendEvent('setThemeMode', 'dark');
	} else {
		store.dispatch('Auth/putTheme', 'light');
		// appBridge.methods.nativeSendEvent('setThemeMode', 'light');
	}
}
</script>

<style scoped></style>
